item.title: Top 5 “Jobs To Be Done” Mistakes Product People Make
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
Innovators, product managers and marketers alike are embracing the Jobs to be Done mindset to design and sell products customers love. Jobs to be Done: customers have progress they want to make in their lives. They hire products and services they believe will help them get the job done (under specific circumstances). There is no …
